data.title: Lisa Lambert
data.meta_description: Ray Ferris Innovation and Sustainability Grant
data.text:
Lisa Lambert co-wrote the Tony Award winning musical THE DROWSY CHAPERONE, which enjoyed productions at Toronto’s Rivoli nightclub, the Fringe Festival of Toronto, Theatre Passe Muraille, Toronto’s Wintergarden Theatre, and the Ahmanson Theater in Los Angeles, before it opened on Broadway in 2006. It has since seen productions all over the world.

Other songwriting credits include SLINGS & ARROWS; SENSITIVE SKIN; HIGHWAY 61 (Rhombus Media); SKIPPY’S RANGERS: THE SHOW THEY NEVER GAVE (Comedy Network); GETTING ALONG FAMOUSLY (CBC TV); and PIPPI LONGSTOCKING (Nelvana Ltd.).
